name: Modern Health
headline: A mental health benefits platform for employers.
description: Modern Health is the leading mental wellness platform that combines clinically validated assessments, personalized stress management support, an international network of certified behavioral health coaches, and licensed therapists to deliver mental health support across a broad range of individual needs. Modern Health empowers employers to lead the charge in helping their employees be less stressed, more engaged, and happier through evidence-based technology and professional support.  Modern Health has raised over $170M from top investors Battery Ventures, Kleiner Perkins, Founders Fund, and John Doerr and supports over 200 companies globally including Lyft, Pixar, SoFi, Credit Karma, Electronic Arts, Cooley, and Okta.

founders.name: Alyson Watson, Founder/CEO
founders.description: Alyson Friedensohn is the founder and CEO of Modern Health, the mental health platform that combines clinically validated assessments, evidence-based digital tools and content, and an international network of certified coaches and licensed therapists available in over 30 languages all within a single app. Founded in 2017, Modern Health serve the needs of 200+ global companies including Pixar, SoFi, Lyft, Nextdoor, EA, Okta, and Rakuten.

# The Global Standard in Mental Health
Modern Health delivers evidence-based, equitable mental health services worldwide — from self-guided tools to crisis care — ensuring our members have the right support wherever in the world they’re located. 
How can we help?
[I'm looking to support my employees](https://www.modernhealth.com/</demo/company>)[I'm a consultant looking to support my clients](https://www.modernhealth.com/</demo/consultant>)[I'm a provider interested in Modern Health](https://www.modernhealth.com/<https:/web.fountain.com/apply/modern-health/opening/modern-health>)[I'm a health plan interested in mental health benefits for our employers and members](https://www.modernhealth.com/</demo/healthplan>)[I'm looking for personal support](https://www.modernhealth.com/</demo/individuals>)
## Solve your greatest business challenges with Modern Health
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f39912be9da2f5c8fc5cc45/67007a1e1589f419b5c1b131_ModernHealth-icon.svg)
1
### Boost productivity and prevent burnout
Equip your workforce with the mental resilience tools they need to combat burnout and maintain peak performance.
2
### Optimize operational efficiency 
Optimize your organization's performance with our sustainable mental health model. We address long-term needs, reduce absenteeism, boost retention, and enhance operational efficiency—all while improving your bottom line.
3
### Attract and retain top talent
Elevate your employer brand and attract top-tier talent in a competitive marketplace by showcasing your commitment to employee well-being through comprehensive mental health support.
The world's top companies choose Modern Health
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66ea499b2bdb92277c3762f4/66ea6e78303636637953d3e9_electronic-arts-logo.png)

Testimonials
## Hear directly from our customers
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66ea499b2bdb92277c3762f4/66ea6c7a489cc0a4a6eb83ea_rsm-logo.png)
**Global Wellbeing Manager Rick Edgerton** discusses business impact, productivity, turnover, burnout, how associates deliver service, how people show-up to work, stigma, recruiting, retention, value to people, higher morale
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66ea499b2bdb92277c3762f4/66ea6c79cf782057fc465897_kraken-logo.png)
**Wellbeing Manager Ingrid Henderson** discusses Pathways, 1:1 coaching, work life balance, ease of use, educate for healthy habits, and clinical research on choice.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66ea499b2bdb92277c3762f4/66ea6c81c0f47825f5abd52d_live-nation-logo.png)
**Global Head of Benefits Emily Monroe** discusses divisive events, what to look for in mental health solutions, promotes Circles, 1:1 care, being proactive.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66ea499b2bdb92277c3762f4/66ea6c79a1b3e6bc766c618d_impact-logo.png)
**CPO Michelle Denman** shares value realization (personal and business), global differentiation, utilization, employer brand
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66ea499b2bdb92277c3762f4/66ea6c79ef0ee5754adce913_netsmart-logo.png)
**CPO Wendy Hill** discusses holistic well-being and integration with performance management, employee life cycle and life events
Our Foundation
## The Modern Health Difference
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f39912be9da2f5c8fc5cc45/673d4014af0bcd076d753c35_icon-replace-eap.svg)
## Replace your EAP with what works
Traditional EAPs overpromise and underdeliver by only reaching 5% of workforces on average. **This leaves 95% untreated** — driving hidden costs through claims, disability leave, and lost productivity.
[Learn More](https://www.modernhealth.com/</employers>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f39912be9da2f5c8fc5cc45/673d412d80b51d4e8b458508_icon-sustainable-care.svg)
## A truly sustainable care model
Our comprehensive care philosophy offers a spectrum of solutions designed to generate meaningful outcomes and align with your business needs. We recognize that a **one-size-fits-all approach would be both costly and ineffective.**
[Our Economic Value](https://www.modernhealth.com/</economic-value>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f39912be9da2f5c8fc5cc45/673d414e1feac46d9f0c2078_icon-rooted-excellence.svg)
## Rooted in clinical excellence
Our clinical team brings decades of combined expertise to the table. This wealth of experience shapes every aspect of our product – from the innovative content we create to the comprehensive approach to care that spans from **prevention to crisis intervention.**
[Our Clinical Excellence](https://www.modernhealth.com/</clinical>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f39912be9da2f5c8fc5cc45/673d415d044bc4fe245d7c3a_icon-best-global.svg)
## The industry's premier network
We uphold the highest standards in mental health care by accepting only **4% of providers**. Our extensive and diverse network spans various specialties and cultural competencies, meeting the unique needs of your global workforce.
[Our Global Impact](https://www.modernhealth.com/</global>)
[Anxiety](https://www.modernhealth.com/<#>)[Low mood](https://www.modernhealth.com/<#>)[New job](https://www.modernhealth.com/<#>)[Communication](https://www.modernhealth.com/<#>)[Mindfullness](https://www.modernhealth.com/<#>)[Professional Growth](https://www.modernhealth.com/<#>)[Burnout](https://www.modernhealth.com/<#>)[Healthy diet](https://www.modernhealth.com/<#>)[Parenting & family](https://www.modernhealth.com/<#>)[Exercise](https://www.modernhealth.com/<#>)
## Personalized health care at scale
Modern Health provides a robust suite of mental health care offerings to keep employees happy, healthy, and motivated. Here’s where the journey begins.
1
**Tell us what you need**

We take a personalized approach to self-assessment, prioritizing how members prefer to receive care. This allows us to structure a plan that best suits each individual member.
2
**Get connected to care**

Using Stepped Care methodology, members can expect unique guidance based on preferences and levels of need. Members around the globe can access culturally centered care in their preferred language.
3
**Assess and adapt**

We know things change, and we’re here to support each member along the way. Members can check in to track changes in their well-being or adjust what they’d like to focus on, whenever they want.
Experiences
## Discover what our customer champions have to say
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f39912be9da2f5c8fc5cc45/630c0f8097b687ff50a25d0e_nextdoor.svg)
“Providing support across the organization required a partner with the ability to reach everyone, regardless of location, language preference, or level of need. Modern Health’s approach to mental health allowed us to frame this resource as something for everyone.”
**Beth Steinberg** Head of People at Nextdoor
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66ea499b2bdb92277c3762f4/66ea6c7ad1833f3400485726_palo-alto-networks-logo.png)
“Modern Health was a more broad approach that helped us hit larger subsets of the population by virtue of the offerings and that it wasn’t so concentrated solely on therapy.”
**Tom Woo‍** VP of Global People at Palo Alto Networks
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66ea499b2bdb92277c3762f4/66ea6c79d8d50a160f7aa9c6_tripactions-logo.png)
“Now more than ever, people need mental health support, and I think employers will engage more and more in activities that are really taking care of their employees.”
**Ariel Cohen‍** CEO and Co-founder at TripActions
Member impact
## Getting personal and career support through coaching
"With the help of Modern Health, I feel so much more prepared for the uncertainty of the future. I’ll be able to ground myself and recenter and be able to make the best decisions moving forward."
**Nicole** Modern Health Member
[Watch Now](https://www.modernhealth.com/<#>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f39912be9da2f5c8fc5cc45/67ae3072ee3a1d01eca60b82_hp-testimonial.jpg)
Community building
## Destigmatizing mental health one conversation at a time.
Join U.S. Surgeon General,**Dr. Vivek Murthy** , and Modern Health's Chief Community Health Advocate, **Naomi Osaka** for an intimate conversation about their mental health journeys and inner voice.
[Watch Now](https://www.modernhealth.com/<#>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66ea499b2bdb92277c3762f4/66ff16f4886f373a70042d88_naomi.jpg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66ea499b2bdb92277c3762f4/66ea6badc6bd23823dcf1d1a_ModernHealth-icon-white.svg)
Ready for your workplace to thrive?
[Talk to our team](https://www.modernhealth.com/</request-demo>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f39912be9da2f5c8fc5cc45/67034ebb202df9dddeea9263_Modern-logo.png)](https://www.modernhealth.com/<#>)

# The Global Standard in Mental Health
Modern Health delivers evidence-based, equitable mental health services worldwide — from self-guided tools to crisis care — ensuring our members have the right support wherever in the world they’re located. 
How can we help?
I'm looking to support my employees⟨28⟩I'm a consultant looking to support my clients⟨29⟩I'm a provider interested in Modern Health⟨30⟩I'm a health plan interested in mental health benefits for our employers and members⟨31⟩I'm looking for personal support⟨32⟩
## Solve your greatest business challenges with Modern Health
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f39912be9da2f5c8fc5cc45/67007a1e1589f419b5c1b131_ModernHealth-icon.svg)
1
### Boost productivity and prevent burnout
Equip your workforce with the mental resilience tools they need to combat burnout and maintain peak performance.
2
### Optimize operational efficiency 
Optimize your organization's performance with our sustainable mental health model. We address long-term needs, reduce absenteeism, boost retention, and enhance operational efficiency—all while improving your bottom line.
3
### Attract and retain top talent
Elevate your employer brand and attract top-tier talent in a competitive marketplace by showcasing your commitment to employee well-being through comprehensive mental health support.
The world's top companies choose Modern Health

Testimonials
## Hear directly from our customers
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66ea499b2bdb92277c3762f4/66ea6c7a489cc0a4a6eb83ea_rsm-logo.png)
**Global Wellbeing Manager Rick Edgerton** discusses business impact, productivity, turnover, burnout, how associates deliver service, how people show-up to work, stigma, recruiting, retention, value to people, higher morale
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66ea499b2bdb92277c3762f4/66ea6c79cf782057fc465897_kraken-logo.png)
**Wellbeing Manager Ingrid Henderson** discusses Pathways, 1:1 coaching, work life balance, ease of use, educate for healthy habits, and clinical research on choice.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66ea499b2bdb92277c3762f4/66ea6c81c0f47825f5abd52d_live-nation-logo.png)
**Global Head of Benefits Emily Monroe** discusses divisive events, what to look for in mental health solutions, promotes Circles, 1:1 care, being proactive.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66ea499b2bdb92277c3762f4/66ea6c79a1b3e6bc766c618d_impact-logo.png)
**CPO Michelle Denman** shares value realization (personal and business), global differentiation, utilization, employer brand
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66ea499b2bdb92277c3762f4/66ea6c79ef0ee5754adce913_netsmart-logo.png)
**CPO Wendy Hill** discusses holistic well-being and integration with performance management, employee life cycle and life events
Our Foundation
## The Modern Health Difference
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f39912be9da2f5c8fc5cc45/673d4014af0bcd076d753c35_icon-replace-eap.svg)
## Replace your EAP with what works
Traditional EAPs overpromise and underdeliver by only reaching 5% of workforces on average. **This leaves 95% untreated** — driving hidden costs through claims, disability leave, and lost productivity.
Learn More⟨5⟩
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f39912be9da2f5c8fc5cc45/673d412d80b51d4e8b458508_icon-sustainable-care.svg)
## A truly sustainable care model
Our comprehensive care philosophy offers a spectrum of solutions designed to generate meaningful outcomes and align with your business needs. We recognize that a **one-size-fits-all approach would be both costly and ineffective.**
Our Economic Value⟨11⟩
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f39912be9da2f5c8fc5cc45/673d414e1feac46d9f0c2078_icon-rooted-excellence.svg)
## Rooted in clinical excellence
Our clinical team brings decades of combined expertise to the table. This wealth of experience shapes every aspect of our product – from the innovative content we create to the comprehensive approach to care that spans from **prevention to crisis intervention.**
Our Clinical Excellence⟨17⟩
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f39912be9da2f5c8fc5cc45/673d415d044bc4fe245d7c3a_icon-best-global.svg)
## The industry's premier network
We uphold the highest standards in mental health care by accepting only **4% of providers**. Our extensive and diverse network spans various specialties and cultural competencies, meeting the unique needs of your global workforce.
Our Global Impact⟨12⟩
Anxiety⟨1⟩Low mood⟨1⟩New job⟨1⟩Communication⟨1⟩Mindfullness⟨1⟩Professional Growth⟨1⟩Burnout⟨1⟩Healthy diet⟨1⟩Parenting & family⟨1⟩Exercise⟨1⟩
## Personalized health care at scale
Modern Health provides a robust suite of mental health care offerings to keep employees happy, healthy, and motivated. Here’s where the journey begins.
1
**Tell us what you need**

We take a personalized approach to self-assessment, prioritizing how members prefer to receive care. This allows us to structure a plan that best suits each individual member.
2
**Get connected to care**

Using Stepped Care methodology, members can expect unique guidance based on preferences and levels of need. Members around the globe can access culturally centered care in their preferred language.
3
**Assess and adapt**

We know things change, and we’re here to support each member along the way. Members can check in to track changes in their well-being or adjust what they’d like to focus on, whenever they want.
Experiences
## Discover what our customer champions have to say
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f39912be9da2f5c8fc5cc45/630c0f8097b687ff50a25d0e_nextdoor.svg)
“Providing support across the organization required a partner with the ability to reach everyone, regardless of location, language preference, or level of need. Modern Health’s approach to mental health allowed us to frame this resource as something for everyone.”
**Beth Steinberg** Head of People at Nextdoor
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66ea499b2bdb92277c3762f4/66ea6c7ad1833f3400485726_palo-alto-networks-logo.png)
“Modern Health was a more broad approach that helped us hit larger subsets of the population by virtue of the offerings and that it wasn’t so concentrated solely on therapy.”
**Tom Woo‍** VP of Global People at Palo Alto Networks
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66ea499b2bdb92277c3762f4/66ea6c79d8d50a160f7aa9c6_tripactions-logo.png)
“Now more than ever, people need mental health support, and I think employers will engage more and more in activities that are really taking care of their employees.”
**Ariel Cohen‍** CEO and Co-founder at TripActions
Member impact
## Getting personal and career support through coaching
"With the help of Modern Health, I feel so much more prepared for the uncertainty of the future. I’ll be able to ground myself and recenter and be able to make the best decisions moving forward."
**Nicole** Modern Health Member

generated_description:
### Modern Health: Revolutionizing Mental Wellness

**What They Do**  
Modern Health is redefining how companies think about mental health by offering a comprehensive benefits platform aimed at improving employee well-being. They blend technology with human touch, providing a suite of services that includes clinically validated assessments and access to certified behavioral health coaches, in addition to licensed therapists. The platform is designed to support various individual needs, enabling organizations to cultivate a happier, more engaged, and ultimately more productive workforce.

**Mission**  
Their mission is clear: to empower employers to tackle mental health challenges facing their employees today. By leveraging evidence-based technology and professional support, Modern Health enables companies to become leaders in promoting mental wellness.

**Funding & Reach**  
Founded in the Y Combinator W18 batch, Modern Health has gained significant traction, raising over $170 million from prestigious investors including Battery Ventures, Kleiner Perkins, and Founders Fund. They cater to over 200 global companies such as Lyft, Pixar, SoFi, and Electronic Arts, demonstrating their extensive market presence.

**Team & Location**  
Based in San Francisco, Modern Health boasts a robust team of about 375 employees, dedicated to delivering world-class mental health solutions.

**Current Services**  
Modern Health is not just about talk therapy; they offer a range of solutions focusing on mental resilience, operational efficiency, and employee attraction and retention. They cater to employers, consultants, members, providers, and health plans with a customizable approach that truly meets diverse needs. Their unique model promotes a sustainable, inclusive support system, distinguishing them from traditional Employee Assistance Programs (EAPs), which tend to underreach.

**The Impact**  
By implementing Modern Health’s platform, businesses can expect higher productivity, reduced burnout, and improved employee morale. The company’s holistic approach to mental wellness sets a new standard in the industry by addressing not just immediate needs, but long-term mental health care.

Whether you're an HR leader, a benefits consultant, or someone in need of personal support, Modern Health opens up a pathway to effective, personalized mental health care. They invite companies to rethink how they support their employees, aiming for a workplace that thrives on mental well-being.

**Website**  
For more information, you can visit their [website](https://www.modernhealth.com/).
